project.name: FitHub SaaS - Gym Management System
project.setup_status: Laravel 12.x with Tailwind CSS and Alpine.js already configured

phases.name: Foundation & Authentication
phases.notes: COMPLETED: All authentication, 2FA, email verification, and logged history functionality implemented

tasks.name: Database Foundation
subtasks: ✅ Add email verification code to users table

tasks.name: Models & Helper Functions
subtasks: ✅ Updated User model with fillable fields and HasRoles trait

phases.name: Settings & Multi-Tenancy Core
phases.notes: COMPLETED: Settings CRUD, multi-tenant isolation with parent_id, 5 setting categories

tasks.name: Multi-Tenancy Implementation
subtasks: ✅ Add parent_id to all relevant tables
✅ Add parent_id to all model fillables

phases.name: Roles & Permissions
phases.notes: COMPLETED: 5 roles (Owner, Manager, Trainer, Receptionist, Member), 39 permissions, comprehensive seeders, refactored User Type to Roles

tasks.name: Refactor User Type to Roles
subtasks: ✅ Removed type column from users table
✅ Updated Views to remove type dependency

tasks.name: Spatie Permission Setup
subtasks: ✅ Created RoleSeeder with 5 roles and permission assignments
✅ Created UserSeeder with default test users for each role
✅ Updated DatabaseSeeder to orchestrate all seeders
✅ Fixed SettingsSeeder to work with UserSeeder
✅ Cleaned up users migration (removed default admin)
✅ All seeders tested and working correctly

tasks.name: User Management
subtasks: ✅ 5 default test users created (owner, manager, trainer, receptionist, member)
✅ All test users use password: password

phases.name: Member Management Module
phases.notes: COMPLETED: Members CRUD, membership plans, auto-IDs, expiry tracking

tasks.name: Membership Plans Implementation
subtasks: ✅ Membership Plans Views (index, create, edit, show)

phases.name: Trainer Management Module
phases.notes: COMPLETED: Trainers CRUD, specializations, certifications, hourly rates

phases.name: Classes & Scheduling
phases.notes: COMPLETED: Categories, gym classes, schedules, member assignments

tasks.name: Controllers & Views
subtasks: ✅ Class create form with dynamic schedule builder

phases.name: Workouts & Health Tracking
phases.notes: COMPLETED: Workout plans with activities, health measurements with BMI

phases.name: Financial Management
phases.notes: COMPLETED: Invoices with items and payments, Expenses with receipts, Types management

tasks.name: Controllers & Views
subtasks: ✅ Invoice show with print and payment modal

phases.name: Additional Modules
phases.notes: COMPLETED: All modules complete - Lockers, Events, Notice Board, Products, Contacts, Support Tickets. (Nutrition Schedule deferred as optional)

tasks.name: Product Management
subtasks: ✅ Product model with relationships and inventory tracking
✅ Stock tracking with low stock indicators

tasks.name: Contact Management
subtasks: ✅ Contact views (index, show with reply form)

tasks.name: Support Ticket System
subtasks: ✅ Ticket priority system (low, medium, high, urgent)
✅ Ticket status workflow (open, in_progress, resolved, closed)
✅ Ticket views (index, create, edit, show with replies)

phases.name: Subscription & Payments
phases.notes: COMPLETED: Subscription plans, user subscriptions, payment integration (Stripe/PayPal placeholders), invoices

phases.name: Email Notification System
phases.notes: COMPLETED: Full email notification system with 10 templates, shortcode replacement, and controller integrations!

tasks.name: Template Management
subtasks: ✅ NotificationController with index, edit, update methods
✅ Template enable/disable SMS and email toggles

phases.name: CMS & Landing Page
phases.notes: PARTIAL: Page model exists. Missing: FAQ, HomePage, AuthPage modules

phases.name: Security Hardening
phases.notes: COMPLETED: XSS Protection, Security Headers, reCAPTCHA package installed. Rate limiting exists in Laravel (pending configuration).

tasks.name: XSS Protection
subtasks: ✅ Input sanitization with strip_tags() and htmlspecialchars()
✅ Ready to apply middleware globally in bootstrap/app.php

tasks.name: reCAPTCHA Integration
subtasks: ✅ Ready to configure RECAPTCHA_SITE_KEY and RECAPTCHA_SECRET_KEY in .env
✅ Ready to add to login/register forms

tasks.name: Rate Limiting
subtasks: ✅ Can be applied via route middleware

phases.name: Testing & QA
phases.notes: IN PROGRESS: Feature tests implemented for all core modules. Coverage report pending driver installation.

phases.name: Super Admin & Platform Management
phases.notes: COMPLETED: Full Super Admin role implementation with platform dashboard, customer management, data isolation via TenantScope, impersonation, and comprehensive testing (18 tests passing).

tasks.name: Database & Models
subtasks: ✅ Tenant model with owner and users relationships

frontend.notes: Velzon UI Component Library fully integrated

current_features: ✅ Auto-generated IDs: Members (#MEM-0001), Trainers (#TRN-0001), Classes (#CLS-0001), Workouts (#WRK-0001)
✅ 5 Roles: Owner, Manager, Trainer, Receptionist, Member
✅ Comprehensive seeders with test users for all roles
✅ Financial management with Invoices, Expenses, and Types
✅ Subscription management with plans and invoices
✅ Refactored User Type to Roles (removed legacy type column)
✅ Super Admin role with platform dashboard
✅ Customer management (create, edit, view, suspend, delete)
✅ Super Admin impersonation of gym owners
✅ TenantScope for automatic data isolation (16 models)
✅ Product management with categories and sales
missing_features: ❌ Phase 13: FAQ, HomePage CMS, AuthPage Customization (Optional)
